<Text: The Louvre Palace (French: "Palais du Louvre" , ] ) is a former royal palace located on the Right Bank of the Seine in Paris, between the Tuileries Gardens and the church of Saint-Germain l'Auxerrois.>

Text: Louvre Palace:  In 1793 part of the Louvre became a public museum, now the Musée du Louvre, which has expanded to occupy most of the building.
